metadata.name: Listening To The Whispers Of Flowers #3
metadata.description:
Everyone experiences ups and downs in life. Monotonous daily routines and struggles in life can make people forget what is joyous and peaceful. You can compare life to a hard drive - in order to store new memories, you must delete the excess and the junk. 

The best way to enjoy the simplicity and beauty of life is to stroll through nature and walk among the flowers. Let your mind calm down. Listen to the flowers whisper in the breeze. Enjoy the blue sky and the fresh air. Allow your thoughts to quiet down and remove any distractions. Life is more beautiful this way.

每个人的一生，总要经历风风雨雨。没有人会是一帆风顺的。每日奔波于事业，操劳于生活，为杂事烦扰，很多人都已忘却了宁静为何物。生命就像一台电脑，储存空间有限。因此必须时常删除一些不必要的东西，才能下载新的内容。

让我们走进大自然，漫步花丛中。让心静下来，倾听花儿在微风中的细语，感受花开花落的声音。天是那么蓝，空气是那么清新。心灵在此荡涤，襟怀在此释然。删除了烦心的杂念，生活会变得更加美好。
